scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml; pnpm -r exec rm -rf node_modules dist
scripts.build: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm run build:playground
scripts.build:packages: pnpm run clean:packages; pnpm -F './packages/**' run build
scripts.alpha: pnpm -F './packages/**' exec pnpm version prerelease --preid alpha
scripts.beta: pnpm -F './packages/**' exec pnpm version prerelease --preid beta
scripts.release:alpha: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm -F './packages/**' publish --tag alpha
scripts.release:beta: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm -F './packages/**' publish --tag beta
scripts.release:canary: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm -F './packages/**' publish --tag canary
